title: So the "random" element of champion shards is a rip-off?
body:
Bought $150 worth of champion shards for a new account after buying all of the sub 500 RP champs.

The result... no Ivern shards period. The last 15 champions to get "randomly" unlocked were all 975rp champions. The very last of which was Ivern.

Random my ass.

replies.body:
ehh no it's random

a friend got ivern and I watched her get it on screenshare when she opened a bunch of boxes and rerolled the champ shards.

It's just luck, mate.

You can get shards of champions you already own, so buying all the 450's didn't help with that.

Rerolling them will give you a random champion you don't own tho.

> [{quoted}](name=TheMoonlitShadow,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=aXTW54kR,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-24T17:08:16.191+0000)
>
> You can get shards of champions you already own, so buying all the 450's didn't help with that.
> 
> Rerolling them will give you a random champion you don't own tho.

I bought all the champs under 500 because it's cheaper than the 585 it costs to buy 3 champ shards... and I didn't want to roll a cheap champ randomly.

I got Ivern on my first reroll after he was released.

He may have been the only champ I didnt have though XD
